availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: United States of America, Presbyterian denomination. Began as a presbytery of the Kentucky Synod of the Presbyterian Church (U.S.A.) during the Great Revival in 1800. Dissolved by the Kentucky Synod in 1804. Reorganized near Dickson, Tennessee, by Reverend Finis Ewing and Reverend Samuel King on February 4, 1810. Grew to become the Cumberland Synod in 1813. Became the Cumberland Presbyterian denomination in 1829.

ab.bibl: "About Us," Cumberland Presbyterian Church, accessed July 20, 2021, https://www.cumberland.org/center/CPCHomePage/About_Us.html.
